Regression of antibody titer vs. age
------------------------------------

<a id="rlm_fit"></a>
## Analysis of antibody titer: robust linear regression
In the following, we fit a robust linear model to the relation:
antibody-titer vs. age. Lots of plots.

### IC50
```{r plot_ic50, dpi=96, message=FALSE}
range_here <- c(0, 4.7)
plot_antibody(ic_data, "H1_brisbane_log", smooth_method="rlm", yrange=range_here)

plot_antibody(ic_data, "H1_brisbane_log", smooth_method="rlm", yrange=range_here)
plot_antibody(ic_data, "H1_PR8_log", smooth_method="rlm", yrange=range_here)
plot_antibody(ic_data, "H2_log", smooth_method="rlm", yrange=range_here)
plot_antibody(ic_data, "H3_brisbane_log", smooth_method="rlm", yrange=range_here)
plot_antibody(ic_data, "H3_HK_log", smooth_method="rlm", yrange=range_here)
plot_antibody(ic_data, "H4_log", smooth_method="rlm", yrange=range_here)
range_here <- c(-20, 75)
plot_antibody(ic_data, "H5_1st_dil_percent", smooth_method="rlm", yrange=range_here)
plot_antibody(ic_data, "H7_1st_dil_percent", smooth_method="rlm", yrange=range_here)
```

----

### EC50
```{r plot_ec50, dpi=96, message=FALSE}
range_here <- c(-1, 4.8)
plot_antibody(ec_data, "H1_pdm09_log", smooth_method="rlm", yrange=range_here)
plot_antibody(ec_data, "H1_PR8_log", smooth_method="rlm", yrange=range_here)
plot_antibody(ec_data, "H2_log", smooth_method="rlm", yrange=range_here)
plot_antibody(ec_data, "H3_log", smooth_method="rlm", yrange=range_here)
plot_antibody(ec_data, "H4_log", smooth_method="rlm", yrange=range_here)
plot_antibody(ec_data, "H5_log", smooth_method="rlm", yrange=range_here)
plot_antibody(ec_data, "H7_vir_log", smooth_method="rlm", yrange=range_here)
plot_antibody(ec_data, "H7_log", smooth_method="rlm", yrange=range_here)
plot_antibody(ec_data, "H12_log", smooth_method="rlm", yrange=range_here)
```
